snippet.title: '12 Years a Slave' Star Lupita Nyong'o -- I Used to Pray For Lighter Skin
snippet.description: 50 days ago - "12 Years a Slave" star Lupita Nyong'o says she repeatedly prayed to God asking for lighter skin during her adolescence ... because she thought having dark black skin was a curse.Nyong'o wasâ€¦
